title: Virtual Search and Destroy
detail: Search the crowd. Find the target. Destroy.
extended_details: The project uses an Oculus headset with two cameras to allow for an augmented reality display. From this display, the computer selects a target that you have to take out before time is up and all hope is lost.

parts_and_costs.part: Amazon.com : YI Home Camera Wireless IP Security Surveillance System (
